overview: Roxette's first major worldwide tour "Join The Joyride 1991 - 92" brought them to 4 continents where over 1,5 million people enjoyed their 108 shows.  In "Live-Ism", join Roxette live on stage in Sydney, Australia and enjoy an exclusive look at the scenes.  As a special bonus, the video of the hit single "How Do You Do!" taken from the "Tourism" album is also included.
title: Roxette - Live-Ism
